      int findIndex(E entity)
      searches for the index of the entity in the list
      Parameters:
      entity - -the entity to be searched
      Returns:
      the index of the given entity or -1 if there is no such entity

    • save

      E save(E entity)
      saves given entity
      Parameters:
      entity - entity must be not null
      Returns:
      the entity - if the given entity was created successfully, otherwise returns null (if the entity already exists)

    • delete

      E delete(E entity)
      removes the entity with the specified id
      Parameters:
      entity - entity must not be null
      Returns:
      the removed entity or null if there is no such entity

    • update

      E update(E entity)
      updates given entity
      Parameters:
      entity - entity must not be null
      Returns:
      null - if the entity is updated, otherwise returns the entity (if this entity does not exist)
